snippet: The U.S. decision allowing minimally processed super-light oil known as condensate to be freely exported may open the door to doing the same with other types of crude too, according to industry and government sources who have reviewed the ruling....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Loophole for Condensate Exports May Apply to Other U.S. Crudes - Sources
headline.main: Exclusive-Loophole for Condensate Exports May Apply to Other U.S. Crudes - Sources

lead_paragraph: The U.S. decision allowing minimally processed super-light oil known as condensate to be freely exported may open the door to doing the same with other types of crude too, according to industry and government sources who have reviewed the ruling.
